mapper.select: SELECT materials.id, materials.name, materials.publisher, materials.note, material_types.name AS materialTypeName, materials.created, materials.status FROM materials JOIN material_types ON materials.material_type_id = material_types.id WHERE materials.status = "ACT"

SELECT materials.id, materials.name, materials.publisher, materials.note, material_types.name AS materialTypeName, materials.created, materials.status FROM materials JOIN material_types ON materials.material_type_id = material_types.id WHERE materials.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO materials (name, publisher, note, material_type_id, created) VALUES (#{name}, #{publisher}, #{note}, #{materialTypeId}, NOW())
